description:
Work Experience

  • Assistant Professor, Department of Artificial Intelligence, CNU (2023.09.01~present)
  • Applied Research Scientist, Search cic, NAVER (2022.06.16~2023.08.16, full-time)
  • National Assembly of the Republic of Korea (2016.06~2016.08, intern)

Education

  • Ph.D. in Information and Communications Engineering, Tokyo Institute of Technology, 2021.12.31 (Advisor: Manabu Okumura, Hiroya Takamura, Hidetaka Kamigaito)
  • M.E. in Information and Communications Engineering, Tokyo Institute of Technology, 2020.03.26 (Advisor: Manabu Okumura)
  • B.S. in Statistics, University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA), 2018.03.24

Email:  jingun.kwon@cnu.ac.kr | Room W2-512

Welcome to the Generative Intelligence Lab at Chungnam National University. Our lab performs cutting-edge research in applied problems in natural language processing.
